question: Working on a project for a company which manufactures alcohol. Our company supplies the computer software.
answer:
QUESTION
I am currently working for a company which provides computer software worldwide. One of the concerns is I will have to for a short period consult to a company in South Africa which manufatures and sells alcohol. Please assit. Shukran
ANSWER


Share:
In principle, it is permissible to work on your computer software project
with the company that manufactures and sells alcohol. However, it is not
advisable to do so.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
